about_the_game:
The world has come to an end. Welcome to the unique world of Dieselpunk 2D Action Adventure game.

This DLC features 100+ pages filled with the Art of Erra: Exordium The imagery consists of curated portraits of ingame characters, enemies, locations, environments, stills from cutscenes, items, sketches and concept art with developer commentaries. Some of the material featured in the Artbook is not shown anywhere else.

After installation

After purchasing and installing the DLC, the PDF artbook will be in the folder "Erra: Exordium Artbook" under the root folder where Erra: Exordium is installed.

For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ErraExordium".

If you are unsure where Erra Exordium is installed, navigate to Erra in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where Erra: Exordium is installed.
detailed_description:
The world has come to an end. Welcome to the unique world of Dieselpunk 2D Action Adventure game.

This DLC features 100+ pages filled with the Art of Erra: Exordium The imagery consists of curated portraits of ingame characters, enemies, locations, environments, stills from cutscenes, items, sketches and concept art with developer commentaries. Some of the material featured in the Artbook is not shown anywhere else.

After installation

After purchasing and installing the DLC, the PDF artbook will be in the folder "Erra: Exordium Artbook" under the root folder where Erra: Exordium is installed.

For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ErraExordium".

If you are unsure where Erra Exordium is installed, navigate to Erra in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where Erra: Exordium is installed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 2.93 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 5600+ 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Erra: Exordium — Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 2.93 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 5600+ 2.9GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ AMD Radeon HD 6450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card

short_description: This DLC features 85 pages filled with the Art of Erra: Exordium. The imagery consists of curated portraits of ingame characters, enemies, locations, environments, stills from cutscenes, items, sketches and concept art. Some of the material featured in the Artbook is not shown anywhere else.
